name: Ruri's Revenge
description:
Ruri's revenge is a 2D platform game where your goal is to beat all the levels and the final boss battle. 

Help Ruri get her revenge!

If you liked the music in this game, check out my Spotify : 

https://bit.ly/srivishnu
